message: how many loc in this repo

input.description: Count lines of code in TypeScript/JavaScript files

content.text: **~59,000 lines of code** in this repo (TypeScript/JavaScript files, excluding `node_modules`, `dist`, and `.git`).

message: show me a breakdown by file type

input.command: find . -type f \( -name "*.ts" -o -name "*.tsx" -o -name "*.js" -o -name "*.jsx" -o -name "*.json" -o -name "*.md" -o -name "*.css" -o -name "*.html" \) -not -path "./node_modules/*" -not -path "./.git/*" -not -path "./dist/*" -not -path "./**/dist/*" -not -path "./**/node_modules/*" -not -path "./pnpm-lock.yaml" | while read f; do echo "${f##*.}"; done | sort | uniq -c | sort -rn

content.content:
313 ts
 153 tsx
  57 md
  43 json
  10 js
   7 css
   4 html

input.command:
for ext in ts tsx js jsx json md css html; do
  count=$(find . -type f -name "*.$ext" -not -path "./node_modules/*" -not -path "./.git/*" -not -path "./dist/*" -not -path "./**/dist/*" -not -path "./**/node_modules/*" -exec cat {} + 2>/dev/null | wc -l)
  printf "%6d LOC  .%s\n" "$count" "$ext"
done | sort -rn
input.description: Count lines of code by file extension

33320 LOC  .ts
 24451 LOC  .tsx

   139 LOC  .html

**Lines of code by file type:**

| Extension | LOC | Files |

| `.tsx`    | 24,451 | 153 |

| `.json`   | 1,837 | 43 |
| `.js`     | 1,289 | 10 |
| `.css`    | 191 | 7 |
| `.html`   | 139 | 4 |

**Total:** ~69,500 LOC across all tracked file types (57,771 in TypeScript/TSX alone).
